org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.view

Interface CreateNewPackageView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    View<CreateNewPackagePresenter>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CreateNewPackageViewImpl

    public interface CreateNewPackageView
extends View<CreateNewPackagePresenter>
    The view for creating a new package. This view gives the option of selecting a base directory to create a package from, or loading an existing package description.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javafx.scene.control.Button getChooseContentDirectoryButton()
      The button for choosing a base directory to generate a package description from.
      javafx.scene.control.TextField getChooseContentDirectoryTextField()
      A text field that is used for displaying the currently selected directory.
      PackageToolPopup getProgressIndicatorPopUp() 
      void showProgressIndicatorPopUp() 

      • Methods inherited from interface org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.view.View

        asNode, getCancelLink, getContinueButton, getErrorLabel, getHeaderViewAboutLink, getHeaderViewHelpLink, getPackageNameLabel, getSaveButton, setAboutPopupContent, setHeaderView, setPresenter, showAboutPopup, showHelpPopup

    • Method Detail

      • getChooseContentDirectoryButton

        javafx.scene.control.Button getChooseContentDirectoryButton()
        The button for choosing a base directory to generate a package description from.
        Returns:
        The button for chossing the content directory

      • getChooseContentDirectoryTextField

        javafx.scene.control.TextField getChooseContentDirectoryTextField()
        A text field that is used for displaying the currently selected directory. Note a text field is used here to allow the user to scroll the text to see the entire path. The text field however is not editable.
        Returns:
        The TextField to use for entering the in base directory.
